name: Johannes Moloantoa
title: Full Stack Engineer
about: Full Stack Engineer with hands-on experience delivering end-to-end products using ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS/ExpressJS, and Spring Boot. I design resilient APIs, integrate databases (MongoDB/PostgreSQL), and deploy to cloud environments with CI/CD. I’ve built and optimized AWS Lambda serverless functions (with shared layers) for performance and cost efficiency, and contributed to microservices migrations on AWS.

achievements: Awarded Best Learner in Mathematics (Grade 12) for the entire circuit.
Designed 20+ AWS Lambda functions using shared layers; improved processing speed by 35% and reusability by 52%.
Led migration of services to a microservices architecture on AWS.
Mentored apprentice developers and established reusable full‑stack templates.
